FireBladeMod:Swipe.NAME: Swipe

FireBladeMod:Shove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E].

FireBladeMod:ComplexDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

FireBladeMod:AdrenalineBoost.DESCRIPTION: Put a fireblademod:Smash or fireblademod:Endurance card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Unbalance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Accelerant.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning. NL Gain !FireBladeMod:M2! fireblademod:Fervor.

FireBladeMod:FlashPoint.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next fireblademod:Flame card is played twice.

FireBladeMod:Improvise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:TargetWeakness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Existing Weak, Vulnerable, and fireblademod:Spirit Rend on the enemy are increased by !M!.

FireBladeMod:FinishingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each fireblademod:Smash in your exhaust pile.
FireBladeMod:FinishingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage for each fireblademod:Smash in your exhaust pile.

FireBladeMod:StunningBlows.NAME: Stunning Blows

FireBladeMod:IntimidatingDurability.NAME: Intimidating Durability
FireBladeMod:IntimidatingDurability.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Endurance cards apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.
FireBladeMod:IntimidatingDurability.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Endurance cards apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card.

FireBladeMod:BattleMageForm.NAME: Battle Mage Form

FireBladeMod:BattleMageForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your attack damage is increased by fireblademod:Fervor. NL Your fireblademod:Flame cards are improved by Strength. NL Gain 1 fireblademod:Fervor. NL Gain 1 Strength.
